nodes.label: Dan's personal cognitive infrastructure
nodes.description: Long-term effort to build a second brain-like system that connects Codex, ChatGPT, agents, and knowledge graph structures for trading, research, and workflow meta-analysis.

north_star.title: North Star (Concise, Durable)
north_star.statement: To build a durable, AI-native knowledge system that compounds in intelligence over time - where ideas become structured artifacts, artifacts become connected meaning, and meaning becomes executable reasoning for both humans and autonomous agents.

design_charter.statement: The Second Brain exists to transform raw information into structured, semantically linked knowledge that can be reasoned over by humans and AI systems alike - enabling long-term cognitive compounding, agent interoperability, and the systematic expansion of insight.
designed_to: Convert conversations, research, and execution into durable knowledge objects
Enable graph traversal and semantic transformation
Support autonomous and collaborative AI reasoning
Improve decision-making and project execution over time
